title: HTML Text Elements Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of HTML text formatting and semantic elements

questions.question: What's the main difference between <strong> and <b>?
questions.explanation: <strong> conveys importance, not just bold style.

questions.question: Which tag should you use for a long quotation?
questions.explanation: <blockquote> is used for longer quotations that are displayed as a separate block of text.

questions.question: Which of these is an inline element?
questions.explanation: <em> is an inline element that emphasizes text without breaking the flow of content.

questions.question: How many heading levels exist in HTML?
questions.explanation: HTML has 6 heading levels: <h1> through <h6>, where <h1> is the largest and <h6> is the smallest.

questions.question: What does <hr> do?
questions.explanation: <hr> creates a horizontal rule (line) that separates content sections.
